arts.ttl: Roberto De Zerbi rules out Leonardo Balerdi for Marseille’s clash against Angers
arts.sum: Olympique de Marseille will be without captain Leonardo Balerdi for Wednesday’s Ligue 1 meeting with Angers, Roberto De Zerbi confirmed in his pre-match press conference – transcribed by La Provence.…

arts.ttl: Timothy Weah joins mounting Marseille injury list before Angers midweek clash
arts.sum: Marseille’s packed autumn schedule is beginning to take its toll on Roberto De Zerbi’s squad. With seven games to play in 21 days, the Italian coach has been forced to…
